name: Book Wyrm
userStoryIWant: I WANT to be able to search for books by title or author, and add or remove books to my personal list
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can keep track of books that I've read or would like to read.

name: Daily Homepage
userStoryIWant: I WANT to be able to quickly see important information about my day
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can keep up-to-date with current events and plan my day efficiently.

name: Elected Officials
userStoryAs: AS A a person with interest in politics
userStoryIWant: I WANT to be able to quickly see who my elected officials are
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can keep up to date with the political climate.

name: Password Generator
userStoryAs: AS AN employee with access to sensitive data
userStoryIWant: I WANT to randomly generate a password that meets certain criteria
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can create a strong password that provides greater security.

name: Day Planner
userStoryAs: AS AN employee with a busy schedule
userStoryIWant: I WANT to add important events to a daily planner
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can manage my time effectively.

name: Employee Tracker
userStoryIWant: I WANT to be able to view and manage the departments, roles, and employees in my company
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can organize and plan my business.

name: Express Note Taker
userStoryAs: AS A user, I want to be able to write and save notes
userStoryIWant: I WANT to be able to delete notes I've written before
userStorySoThat: SO THAT I can organize my thoughts and keep track of tasks I need to complete.
